title: eNNiyE
sahitya:
eNNiyE nidamunaip-paNNAl pADiDum eLiyEnukkaruLa Eninda tAmadam


anupallavi

  paNNina pApamellAm panjAip-parandiDa ninnaruL pOdumenrE ninaiyE nambinEn


caraNam    pArvati maindanE panniru kaiyanE bhAvaiyiNai vaLLi deivAnai maNavALA 
shIr shEr tirumAlin shelvat-tirumahA pArilun padAmbujamE arivEn veTriyEn
